metadata.description: Conservative spelling corrections for artist names and venue names in the Bay Area Punk Shows database
notes: Artist corrections should ONLY map clear misspellings/typos to the correct spelling
Do NOT remove 'the' from band names or make stylistic changes
Venue corrections should map common variations to the standardized venue name with proper capitalization
All keys should be lowercase for consistent matching, but values should use proper capitalization
This file can be updated independently of the processing script
Changes take effect on the next database processing run
